name: StarFate
description:
StarFate is a game in which you have to defend the last satanic cross left in the world from the "loyal destroyers", every time you kill one, you will receive a soul that will heal the cross to continue fighting until the end, Good Luck :)

Music Composer: 

                                                                 LUXCI 30 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkznUyTExjbAnw3mi-GrLxw
